channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Will you delay retirement so your kids can have health insurance until they’re 26?
item.description: A surprising number of parents are answering yes to that question.

item.title: The Ryder Cup pours millions into promoting golf. But does the sport even need saving?
item.description: While debate swirls around who is or isn’t being paid at the Ryder Cup, and where the money is going, here’s a look at the state of the sport today.

item.title: I inherited $600,000 in Apple shares from my mother. Am I crazy if I don’t sell them now?
item.description: “Apple now makes up about 50% of my portfolio.”
